title: Restauracja Ciasna
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, International, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out
description:
Small and cozy 100% vegetarian/vegan restaurant located in the center of the city, close to the ruins of the Teutonic Knights' Castle.
Serves breakfast, soups and main dishes in addition to drinks such as tea, coffee, juices, and bit of alcohol. Staff speaks some English, and an English menu is available. The vegan dishes are clearly marked and comprise more than half of the menu.
